title: Encyclopedia of Herbs and Their Uses The Definitive Guide to the Identification, Cultivation and Uses of 1,000 Herbs
description: 1995, oversize hardcover edition, Dorling Kindersley, NY. 424 pages. Massive title, describing over 1,000 herbs grown worldwide / and their uses. Compiled by a gardener / botanist. Over 1,500 herb photographs. Color / black and white. Has all kinds of information, as well as an A-Z dictionary of herbs. Extremely well done.
author: Deni Brown
